repnme.cdata!:
Armenia - Additional Financing for Social
            Protection Administration Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Social Protection Administration
            Project for the Republic of Armenia had a moderately
            satisfactory outcome, with the risk to development outcome
            deemed negligible. The Bank's performance was rated
            moderately satisfactory, while the borrower's
            performance was satisfactory. The significant lessons
            learned during the implementation of the project are: 1)
            client capacity-building for monitoring and evaluation
            should have priority over use of external contractors; 2)
            management model and staffing arrangements of the Integrated
            Social Services Centers (ISSCs) need to be geared towards
            efficiencies and effectiveness; 3) an investment loan can be
            a powerful vehicle for sector policy dialogue; 4) Mid-Term
            Reviews (MTR) should not be delayed; and 5) the shifting of
            disbursement plans necessitates a restructuring of the project.

repnme.cdata!:
Armenia - Social Protection Administration
            Project : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The Social Protection Administration
            Project aims to improve Armenia's capacity to provide
            more efficient, effective and high quality services to the
            population by the public employment, pension and social
            assistance agencies. The reallocation is necessary to: (a)
            support establishment of additional Integrated Social
            Service Centers in order to have at least 15 centers fully
            functional by the end of the Project, which will require
            investments in the civil works, furniture, IT hardware and
            software; and (b) complete the modernization of the
            'Gorts' information system of the State Employment
            Service and improve the information system of the State
            Labor Inspectorate.

display_title.display_title:
Armenia - Social Protection
            Administration Project : restructuring  (Vol. 2) : Data sheet
